name: damp

effect.black_white: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.black_2_white_2: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.black_white: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
